H702.def: = state in which a countable entity is four in number

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H1867.def: = man; ► king of {L:Persia<SDBH:פָּרַס>}, in post-exilic times

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H8671.def: = state in which a countable entity is the ninth in a range

H2320.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H3691.def: = month, equivalent to period November/December; ► post-exilic

H1008.def: = town and cult centre, also referred to as {L:Beth-Aven<SDBH:בֵּית אָוֶן>} or simply {L:Aven<SDBH:אָוֶן>}; ◄ territory of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}, near the border of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H8272.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Sennacherib<SDBH:סַנְחֵרִיב>}, king of {L:Assyria<SDBH:אַשּׁוּר>}, ► who, together with his brother {L:Adrammelech<SDBH:אַדְרַמֶּלֶךְ>}, killed his father

H7278.def: = man; ◄ from {L:Bethel<SDBH:בֵּית־אֵל>}; ► sent to the temple to entreat YHWH's favor; time of {L:prophet<SDBH:נָבִיא>} {L:Zechariah<SDBH:זְכַרְיָה>}

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H2470.def: = process by which humans lose their physical strength ◄ as a result of sickness, injury, a prolonged exertion of strength, or other circumstances

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H1058.def: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person

H5144.def: literally: to separate oneself (from certain things); hence: = action by which humans intentionally keep their distance from certain objects

H2549.def: = state in which a countable entity is the fifth in a range

H2320.def: = period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H6684.def: = action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him

H5594.def: = action by which human perform the mourning ritual for someone who has died, or for another tragic event; this may include {L:wailing<SDBH:ילל>}, tearing one's clothes, putting on {L:sackcloth<SDBH:שַׂק>}, covering oneself with dust or ashes, {L:fasting<SDBH:צום>} or eating specific food, {L:cutting oneself<SDBH:גדד>}, {L:shaving one's head<SDBH:קרח>}, covering part of one's face, etc.; this usually takes place during a specific period of time and ends after the burial has taken place, but it may also be repeated in later days to commemorate a tragic event

H2549.def: = state in which a countable entity is the fifth in a range

H7637.def: = state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range

H7657.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H7223.def: = state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H7961.def: = state in which humans can live without fear or concerns, which is either or not appropriate depending on the situation

H5045.def: =  an area of land located in the south of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, consisting of little vegetation and with very little annual rainfall; inhabited by numerous peoples - initially by the Canaanites in {L:Arad<SDBH:עֲרָד>} and the {L:Amelekites<SDBH:עֲמָלֵקִי>}, later, the people of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H8219.def: literally: the lowland; = the area situated between the {L:hill-country<SDBH:הַר>} and the coastal plain, which consists of foothills; named thus by the Israelites who occupied the hill-country; known for its {L:olive trees<SDBH:זַיִת>} and {L:sycamore trees<SDBH:שִׁקְמָה>}

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H571.def: = state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H2617.def: = state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

H7356.def: = state in which humans feel compassion for others, ◄ caused by affection for that person and/or the lack of well-being of that person; ► this feeling is usually translated into action

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

34.gl: a man ... his brother > one ... each other

H490.def: = woman whose husband has died and therefore has difficulty caring for herself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

H3490.def: = person whose father has passed away and therefore unable to care for himself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the widows, and other people who are poor

H1616.def: = state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker classes within the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the widows, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

H6041.def: = a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility

H2803.def: = action by which humans exercise their {L:mind<SDBH:לֵב>} with regard to something

H3824.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H251.def: = son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

26.gl: a man ... his brother > one ... each other

H3985.def: = state in which humans and deities are unwilling to assent to a suggestion or proposal

H7181.def: = action by which humans or deities pay close attention in order to be able to hear what (other) humans might be saying, or to pick up other sounds and react to if needed

H5637.def: = state by which humans or animals stand up to or oppose the authority of a person or ruler or deity

H3802.def: = the joint between each arm and the main part of the human body; ► often used for carrying heavy weights

H3513.def: = state in which objects have relatively much weight, ≈ which is often associated with slowness, functioning with difficulty, but also with importance, riches, status, etc.

H241.def: = one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H8068.def: = a legendary rock or mineral, known for its hardness; ≈ associated with an inflexible mind

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H8451.def: = causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H7223.def: = state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H7110.def: = process by which humans or deities respond with anger to a situation in which (other) humans have disobeyed an order or broken a law

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H6635.def: = state of being in the service of the community; ≈ sometimes associated with suffering and heavy labor

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H8074.def: = state in which an area has become empty as a result of destruction and depopulation

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration
